title: Techno - Futuristic Font
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317160935im_/http:/typophile.com/files/maintest_5085.png)
  
Hello Guys, I would be very grateful if you could help me identify this font. There are few of them out there but this is unique, the N and M corners make the difference.

Thanks a lot  
Lida

Font: 

 Swisz 

Solved By: 

 [fvilanakis](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317160935/http:/typophile.com/user/176276 "View user profile.")
author: eklipse

comments.content: It must be **Swisz** by Dirk Uhlenbrock [2002] but I can't find a legitimate source to acquire it
You've just saved my day! Thanks a million!!!
